meta.job_title: Mechanical & Chemical Engineer - ARC Rotational Program

duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a highly competitive two-year rotational program to accelerate professional growth & experience in various key areas of Mechanical & Chemical Engineering.
Work directly with leaders and mentors to build technical and leadership skills through three, eight-month engineering assignments.
Interact with various teams across the organization, one-on-one mentoring, challenging projects, exposure to senior management, and leadership development activities.
Relocation 2-3 times throughout the course of the program, handling a variety of roles within field, project, process, and applications engineering.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Engineering (Mechanical, Chemical, Engineering Technology)
